titleStmt.title: Foure sermons whereof two, preached at two assizes, this present yeare, 1638. at Maidestone in Kent, the other two, in his own charge. By Robert Abbot ...
titleStmt.author: Abbot, Robert, 1588?-1662?

titleStmt.title: Foure sermons whereof two, preached at two assizes, this present yeare, 1638. at Maidestone in Kent, the other two, in his own charge. By Robert Abbot ...
titleStmt.author: Abbot, Robert, 1588?-1662?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Paine, for P. Stephens, and C Meredith, and are to be sold at their shop, at the signe of the Golden Lyon, in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: "The SR record is for 5 sermons; the 5th is 59.5, which, although its collation fills a gap in 58, is not found included in any of the copies except C5 and was app[arently]. issued separately by the publishers' change of plan"--STC.
"The Christians thrift in keeping: or two sermons preached on 1 Tim.i.19" has separate pagination and caption title.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
